Subject: Rule exception
Description:
Hello,

I would like to exclude some finding from a rule scanning that I know are false positives. How should I do that please ? I don't want to exclude completely the rule to be scanned. 

Regards,
Thomas Bozzini
Solution_Comment__c:
Question
How to exclude a finding from a rule

Answer
Use the "no action plan" icon to create the exclusion for this machine
